name: most-w3msg
description: most.js Web Messaging - event streams for WebSockets, EventSource, MessageChannel, Worker, etc.

scripts.build-dist: mkdir -p dist && rollup src/most-w3msg.js | babel --presets es2015 --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --module-id 'most-w3msg' -o dist/most-w3msg.js
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && uglifyjs dist/most-w3msg.js -o dist/most-w3msg.min.js
scripts.lint: jsinspect src && jsinspect test && eslint src test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test

author: Brian Cavalier <brian@hovercraftstudios.com> (github.com/briancavalier)
